entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Natashquan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:55 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -26.4°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
